name_original: Handle With Care (Liss1024, superemokid, pilgrim1987, Frozen_Light77, Andriy Trak, Anabiozzz, basedonaclick, AndrewRain, Михаил Е., 23edsa)
description:
"This platform is quite old - stabilizers, magnetic cargo locks don't work, but at least it still flies!"

- letter from J.M.

Now you can deliver goods of unclear purposes, content and owners, and if you will get lucky -  you even will be paid. Put on your magnetic boots to prevent falling from the platform, your good old hazmat suit to not die from polluted world around you - and hold on controls tight - this is gonna be hell of unstable flight.

Everything was created from scratch as submission for Ludum Dare 49

Controls:

We advise using controller

A/Left Trigger/LMB to fire left engine

D/Right Trigger/RMB to fire right engine

R to quick restart

To win you have to deliver at least half of boxes to complete level. Also you need to put your platform at landing gear to trigger level end.
